Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the photo is of the Kumbh Mela in Prayagraj, when it is actually a photo of Mina in Mecca.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the claim that the photo is of the Kumbh Mela.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo is of the Kumbh Mela based on the caption in the Hindi language, without verifying the accuracy of the information.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the photo, as it has been identified as a photo of Mina in Mecca through reverse image search and verification by AFP.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo is not of the Kumbh Mela in Prayagraj, but of Mina in Mecca.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by incorrectly stating that the photo is of Prayagraj, when it is actually of Mina.
